results.title: Dark side beside the river
results.brief_description: The chain reaction of life when one thing leads to another and before you know it you’re on a treadmill of anger, alienation, dislocation and isolation. A personal reflection.

results.title: The Expectation
results.brief_description: The youngest and shyest of 12 kids in the family, with high expectations by his father for him to achieve, Enoch reflects on his life, his family and his own future desires.

results.title: Life in horror
results.brief_description: Duy ever since a child has had an obsession with horror movies - they are his life and he knows them all. He has rules to avoid real life horror situations and his philosophy on life - live it to the max!

results.title: The Lucky country
results.brief_description: Bai Chan’s parents migrated out to Australia soon after they married in China in 1988. Here he reminisces about his parents’ family, life and culture in their birth country, China, comparing it to his own here in Australia.
results.description: Bai Chan’s parents migrated out to Australia soon after they married in China in 1988. Here he reminisces about his parents’ family, life and culture in their birth country, China, comparing it to his own here in Australia.

group.title: Western stories: expressions for the future. Vol. 2

results.title: Discoveries
results.brief_description: Chaos, jealousy, violence, anger and fear - childhood emotions experienced by Angela as she compares her life to the game of soccer. Angela is the soccer ball, her parents the two opposing teams - and no-one is the winner in this game of life, especially Angela. But she is playing her own game now and nothing will stop her - not even Brazil.
results.description: Chaos, jealousy, violence, anger and fear - childhood emotions experienced by Angela as she compares her life to the game of soccer. group.title: Western stories: expressions for the future. Vol. 2

results.title: Gilmore girl
results.brief_description: Moving house is one thing but changing schools is a totally different story. Anda talks about her journey to find her place, of moving house from St Albans to Yarraville and eventually back to St Albans, of leaving the old and familiar behind and having to confront a new school, new friends and an unfamiliar environment.
results.description: Moving house is one thing but changing schools is a totally different story. results.title: Norbert
results.creator_credit: Michael Hill and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
Animated ‘fractured fairytale’ story about Norbert, with abnormally big ears, and the prejudices he faces from the local townsfolk. Being different, Norbert soon discovers, means a lonely and alienated life. A rather bleak piece laced with moments of off-beat black humour. Narrated by V J Shanmugam.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.

results.title: An Inner passion
results.creator_credit: Hung Lin and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
Hand-drawn 2-D animated moral tale of a baker and his assistant and how one person’s passion can inspire and change the actions of their bullying and intolerant boss.
Original music score by James Hodson. No dialogue.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.
